pages.text: $(2)$(l)These events will have influence on your difficulty: $()$(li)Entering the Twilight Forest$(li)Entering the Nether$(li)Killing Wither for the first time$(li)Using Ender Charm$(li)Entering$(c) Hardmode$()$(li)Obtaining Wyvern Core$(li)Obtaining Awakened Core$(li)Killing Chaos Guardian for the first time$(li)Obtaining Chaotic Core$(li)Using $(6)Death Coin$()$(li)Obtaining Infinity Catalyst
